sn34.1:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo.
sn34.1:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.1:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo.
sn34.1:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo ca.
sn34.1:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.1:1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṁ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṁ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.1:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ samāpattikusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34.2:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34.2:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.2:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34.2:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo ca.
sn34.2:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.2:1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṁ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṁ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.2:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34.3:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.3:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.3:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.3:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
sn34.3:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

sn34.4:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.4:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo.
sn34.4:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo ca.
sn34.4:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.5:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo.
sn34.5:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.5:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo.
sn34.5:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34.5:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.6:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo.
sn34.6:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.6:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo.

sn34.6:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

sn34.7:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.7:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo.

sn34.7:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

sn34.8:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo.
sn34.8:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ samādhikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī.

sn34.20-27:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.20-27:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo.
sn34.20-27:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo.
sn34.20-27:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ ṭhitikusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca.
sn34.20-27:1.11: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva sattavīsatimā ṭhitimūlakasappāyakārīsuttā aṭṭha suttāni pūretabbāni. Ṭhitimūlakaṁ.)
sn34.28-34:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.5: samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.6: neva samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.7: samādhismiṁ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo ca.
sn34.28-34:1.11: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva catuttiṁsatimā vuṭṭhānamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā satta suttāni pūretabbāni. Vuṭṭhānamūlakaṁ.)
sn34.35-40:1.3: samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.35-40:1.5: samādhismiṁ kallitakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo ca.
sn34.35-40:1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva cattālīsamā kallitamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā cha suttāni pūretabbāni. Kallitamūlakaṁ.)
sn34.41-45:1.3: samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo …
sn34.41-45:1.5: samādhismiṁ ārammaṇakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca.
sn34.41-45:1.9: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva pañcacattālīsamā ārammaṇamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā pañca suttāni pūretabbāni.)
sn34.46-49:1.3: samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo …
sn34.46-49:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34.46-49:1.5: samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca …
sn34.46-49:1.6: seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṁ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṁ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.46-49:1.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ …pe…
sn34.46-49:2.1: Chacattālīsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī …pe….
sn34.46-49:3.1: Sattacattālīsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī …pe….
sn34.46-49:4.1: Aṭṭhacattālīsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ gocarakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34.50-52:1.3: samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo …
sn34.50-52:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī …
sn34.50-52:1.5: samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī ca.
sn34.50-52:2.1: Paññāsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī …pe….
sn34.50-52:3.1: Ekapaññāsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ abhinīhārakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34.53-54:1.3: samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī …
sn34.53-54:1.4: neva samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī …
sn34.53-54:1.5: samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca.
sn34.53-54:2.1: Tepaññāsamaṁ. “Samādhismiṁ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī …pe….
sn34.55:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī.
sn34.55:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī hoti, na samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī.
sn34.55:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī neva samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī.
sn34.55:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca.
sn34.55:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.55:1.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gavā khīraṁ, khīramhā dadhi, dadhimhā navanītaṁ, navanītamhā sappi, sappimhā sappimaṇḍo tatra aggamakkhāyati;
sn34.55:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ jhāyī samādhismiṁ sātaccakārī ca hoti, samādhismiṁ sappāyakārī ca ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ jhāyīnaṁ aggo ca seṭṭho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cā”ti.
sn34.55:1.12: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
